GSD.product_version: versions from v4.16 to before v5.10.124
GSD.description:
block: Fix handling of offline queues in blk_mq_alloc_request_hctx()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.124 by commit 7fa28a7c3d74933a4fc22d341b60927952f31c19, it was introduced in version v4.16 by commit 20e4d813931961fe26d26a1e98b3aba6ec00b130. For more details please see the references link.
